You can add bear's garlic, garlic, onions and/or any herbs you like (e.g., fresh thyme) to the cheese. A pinch of sugar can add to the taste but may not be compatible with all other spices.
Fill the substance into a small, round form, to give it the form of a cheddar cheese.

name: Spaghetti a la Monegasque
steps: Simmer the 3 peeled, whole cloves of garlic in 2 tablespoons olive oil, then add and cook in this same oil 3 medium-size, peeled, seeded tomatoes cut into slices.

Separately, dissolve 2-3 unsalted anchovies in 1 tablespoon olive oil in a small saucepan. Add to them the capers, stoned olives (Black or Green), tarragon or basil. Combine the two mixtures and turn them into a pot of cooked, drained, hot spaghetti. Let simmer for 3-4 minutes, then serve immediately.
Grated cheese should be served separately and sprinkled on individual servings.

name: Fuk-Thong Pad Khai
steps: To prepare the pumpkin, remove seeds and cut off the outside skin of the pumpkin. Then slice the pumpkin into 1-inch cubes and wash well with water.
Heat the oil in a pan and fry the garlic until it becomes lightly browned and fragrant.
Add the minced pork to the pan wait until the pork nearly cooked.
Cut the pumpkin and place in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to the boil and cook until tender. When it is soft drain and then add to the pork.
Crack the eggs into the pan.
Once the eggs are cooked, stir with pumpkin and minced pork.
Add the other ingredients: fish sauce, sugar, pepper, garlic, onion, oyster sauce and stir.
Served with warm rice.

name: Watalappam
steps: Beat the eggs in a mixer. Add the milk, brown sugar, cardamom and cloves to the beaten eggs. Mix well. Add the mixture into a pot and steam for 20 minutes. Add the cashews.
Alternatively, the mixture can be poured into multiple small aluminum baking foils and then steamed for about 5–10 minutes.

name: Clam dip

ingredients.name: Minced canned or fresh cooked clams

steps: Combine all ingredients and refrigerate.

name: Tartar Sauce

ingredients.name: unces sweet pickle relish or finely chopped sweet pickles

steps: I suggest placing the mayonnaise in the mixing bowl first, and whipping it until it's smooth.
Mix in the other ingredients

name: Tembleque
steps: Put all the ingredients into a sauce pan.
Mix the corn starch into the liquid while everything is still cold.
Turn the heat on low and stir constantly until the pudding thickens.
Pour into pudding cups or small bowls.
Cool in the fridge for 2 hours.

name: Bean balls
steps: Ground the beans (after skin has been peeled off) to a fine fluffy paste.
Add grounded pepper,onion and salt to the paste and mix well.
Put oil into a large frying pan and allow till hot, use a serving spoon to scoop paste into hot oil, fry until golden brown.
Serve hot with Corn pap or bread.

name: Swedish Cabbage soup
steps: Quarter the head of cabbage. Remove the inner stem.
Slice the cabbage across into 3 mm, or thinner, strips.
In a cast-iron pot, melt some butter and brown the sliced cabbage.
Add stock, covering the cabbage. Season with salt, grounded white pepper, and 12 whole allspice kernels.
Boil the soup softly for 30-45 minutes.
Serve with hard flatbread, butter, and cheese.

name: Kasnocken
steps: Mix flour, eggs, water, and salt carefully to get a dough (it should not be whisked; the dough should neither be stiff nor too soft).
Pass the dough through a special sieve for dumplings into boiling, salted water.
Boil the small dumplings for about 3 minutes and then strain and quench them with cold water.
Melt the butter in a pan, add the dumplings, and season them with salt and pepper.
Gradually add the grated cheese and stir vigorously.
When all of the cheese has melted, heat butter in another pan, add the onion rings, and fry them until they become golden brown.
Finally, coat the dumplings with the roasted onion rings and chives.

name: Spanish Potato Omelette
steps: Peel the potatoes, wash them and dry them with a cloth. Then dice them up in 1cm cubes or 2 mm slices. Wash and dry them again. Add some salt to your taste and mix them.
Heat the oil and when it is hot, fry the potatoes but do not let them get brown. Once they're done, drain the oil and store the potatoes.
Dice or slice the onion and fry it until is translucent
Beat the 8 eggs in a bowl with a small amount of salt, until the mix is homogenous and then mix in the potatoes and the onion.
In an empty pan put three tablespoons of olive oil (or you can use the previous pan after removing most of the oil).
Once the pan is hot, drop the egg with the onion and the potatoes in the pan.

After 7-8 minutes the bottom part should be done. Put the dish over the pan and carefully turn it around, so that the undone part rests on the dish. This is the most difficult step of the recipe. After that, you put again the pan on the fire and slowly drop the mix on the pan, to do the other side.
After a couple of additional minutes, it should be done and it can be served

name: Gluten Veggie Meat

ingredients.name: bag of Vital Wheat Gluten Flour

steps: In a large bowl, add bag of gluten flour, garlic powder, parsley flakes and ¾ cup of water
Mix gluten flour, seasoning and water in bowl
Knead for about 2 minutes, cover and set aside for 10 minutes.
Slice gluten into meat pieces. The smaller the pieces, then firmer the final texture.
Bring large pot w/ lid to boil and add bouillon cubes
Add sliced pieces of gluten to seasoned, boiling water
Reduce heat to subtle simmer
Cover with lid and simmer for 55 minutes, stir occasionally
Drain substantially larger gluten pieces, and place in another bowl to cool
In another bowl with a lid add all-purpose flour, onion powder, and salt; cover and shake
In yet another bowl, pour in soy sauce for dipping
Dip several pieces of cooled gluten in bowl with soy sauce
Next, place gluten pieces in bowl with seasoned flour, cover and shake.
Fry in frying pan with oil until browned

name: Dharwad pedha
steps: Boil milk (full fat milk) fully and then turn into low flame.
Keep adding one tablespoon of lime juice until the milk solidifies and greenish water will be left aside.
After the milk solidifies, filter it using cloth. This is nothing but paneer.
Take the paneer and start frying in a pan, adding little ghee as necessary.
With a spoon, press the paneer until it becomes small grains. After this process is done in 10-15 mins in low flame, remove it.
Add half a cup milk and eight tablespoons sugar. Make it into a paste and transfer it to the frying pan.
Start cooking on medium heat very very patiently with nonstop stirring. Keep adding little milk if you see it is dry.
When it becomes brown and granular, remove this peda mixture from pan. It takes sometime as long as 1.5 hours to reach this consistency.
Add cardamom powder to this mixture and let it cool down.
Once it is cools to normal temperature, mix it in grinder. If it is dry to make it into round pedas, add 2-3 tablespoon of milk and mix.
Once done, roll into uneven oval shaped pedha, garnish it with little sugar.

name: Pan de Jamón
steps: In a large bowl stir 1 teaspoon of the brown sugar into the water and sprinkle the yeast on top. Let sit 5-8 minutes until the yeast is foamy.

While the yeast is proofing, lightly chop the raisins and olives, or give them a few pulses in a food processor. Put in a small bowl and set aside. Make sure the olives are drained of liquid before chopping.
Once the yeast is foamy, add 1 cup of the flour, one egg, and 4 tablespoons of the butter. Mix thoroughly with a fork or with dough hooks.

Add the second cup of flour, the milk, 4 teaspoons of the brown sugar, olive oil, and the salt. Blend thoroughly until it pulls together. Knead by hand or with dough hooks for 5-6 minutes. The dough should be smooth and slightly sticky.
Place the dough in an oiled bowl and lightly cover the top of the dough with spray oil. Put in a warm place to rise, about 90 minutes.
Once the dough is risen, turn out onto a lightly floured surface and roll into a square about 12 inches to a side. Brush with the remaining melted butter.
Place a layer of ham slices, leaving a strip about 1 inch on one side uncovered. This will form the outermost edge of the roll.
Spread the raisin / olive mixture evenly on top of the ham.
Starting on the inner edge, tightly roll up the dough. It should make 3 or 4 full revolutions.

Wet the uncovered strip of dough and roll the loaf until the edge is directly on the bottom. This allows the dough to stick to itself and form a tight seal. Pinch and twist the ends of the loaf with wet fingers to seal.
Place the loaf on parchment paper on a large baking sheet.
Beat the remaining egg with the remaining 1 teaspoon of brown sugar. Evenly brush the outside of the loaf with the mixture, taking care to wipe away any puddles that form.
Put in a warm place to continue rising, about 40 minutes.
Pre-heat the oven to 350F. Put the loaf in and bake for 30-40 minutes.
Remove and cool on a wire rack.
To serve, cut into slices about the width of your finger.

name: Pretzel
steps: Dissolve the yeast in the water.
Mix in the salt, sugar, and flour.
Knead the dough until it is smooth.
Roll out (do not cut) a blob of dough until it is about 18 inches long.

If a traditional shape is desired: Make a loop with the middle of the dough, crossing the dough over itself at about the 15% and 85% areas. Give this contact point a 180° twist, then flip it (and the ends) over toward the middle of the dough piece so that the ends overlap the more-central part at about the 45% and 55% areas.
Brush the pretzel with egg.
Sprinkle coarse salt onto the egg.
Bake at 425°F for 15 minutes.

name: Cornbread
steps: Mix water yeast and sugar. Let this sit for a few minutes until it bubbles.
Stir in the rest of the ingredients, adding water until it is pourable.
Bake in a greased 9×9 pan at 350°F (175°C, gas mark 4) for 25 minutes or until the edges turn golden brown.

name: Yubeshi
steps: Make walnuts coarse.
Put sugar, soy sauce and water in a pan and simmer until sugar melts and boils while stirring so as not to burn.
Add shiratama-ko and mix well.
Heat in a microwave for 30~40 seconds, take it out and mix well. Repeat this until it gets brown.
Mix walnut and put it in the range 1 to 2 times again, when it gets brown solidly, the finish of the dough
Pour the dough into a flat container and let it cool.

name: Ponche de Crème
steps: Beat eggs and lime peel until light and fluffy.
Add evaporated milk.
Sweeten to taste with condensed milk.
Add bitters, grated nutmeg and rum according to taste.
Remove lime peel and serve over crushed ice.

name: Nesquik à la Café
steps: Put all ingredients in a glass or cup of hot water. Stir until dissolved.
Serve with your choice of food.

name: Creamed Corn

ingredients.name: Salt and black pepper to taste

steps: Drain the can of corn, preserving the liquid.
Put half of the corn into a bowl and purée it with a wand blender, adding some liquid from the can if necessary to keep it from getting too dry.
Mix puréed corn and remaining whole corn kernels in a saucepan.
Add the diced bell pepper, butter, and cream or milk and heat over medium heat, stirring occasionally. You can add more cream or milk if it's not creamy enough. Salt and pepper to taste.

name: Ertesuppe
steps: Soak the dry peas overnight in about 4 cups of cold water.
Add 8 cups of water to the peas and soak water. Simmer the peas in a pot until soft.
In a separate pot, boil the smoked butt for 40 minutes per pound.
Cut the smoked butt into small cubes and add to the softened pea stock.
Peel the onion and chop it into fine pieces. Add to the stock.
Add half the salt and pepper, and add more to your taste.
Add the thyme
Cook for at least 5 minutes together, adding water from the meat if the stock is too thick. Cook longer if it is too thin.

name: Barbecued Spare Ribs

ingredients.name: Freshly ground black pepper and salt to taste

steps: Place spare ribs in a large baking dish in one layer. In a small bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Pour over spare ribs and coat on both sides. Marinate overnight, basting occasionally.
Preheat the oven to 375 °F. Place a large, shallow roasting pan on the oven bottom. Fill with 1/2 inch water. Place spare ribs on a roasting rack.
Roast ribs for 45 minutes.
Raise oven temperature to 450 °F, and roast for 15 more minutes.
Serve hot or cold.

name: Jam Sandwich
steps: Get one slice of bread.
Spread the jam onto the bread.
(optional) Get a second slice of bread and put it on top of the side of bread you have put the jam on.

name: Gooey Butter Cake
steps: Mix box of yellow cake mix, one egg and four oz of butter to create a stiff dough.
Spray a 9" x 13" pan with oil.  Spread the dough evenly in the pan, and up the sides.
Melt the remaining butter, and mix the remaining ingredients to create the filling, adding the cream cheese and then the confectioner's sugar last.  Gently warming the cream cheese aids mixing.
Pour the filling into the crust, and bake at 350 degrees F for 45 minutes.  Allow to cool and firm.

name: Turkish dolma pilav
steps: Wash the rice until the water runs clear.
Saute pine nuts and onions over medium heat in a deep skillet with lid
Add cinnamon, mint, salt, sugar and black pepper
Add the rice and stir constantly until the rice turns translucent
Add water, enough to cover the rice and cook on low heat.
When the water is absorbed, check the rice. Add more water or spices if needed.
Quickly add currants, they should soften in the steam but can be soaked in hot water if preferred.
If needed, use paper towel and a pan with a closed lid to steam the rice until it is finished cooking.

name: Egg with cabbage and Turkish sucuk
steps: Heat olive oil in a medium sized pot with lid.
Add sliced sucuk and quickly brown.
Add chopped cabbage.
Add red pepper paste and mix.
Add a little water, around 1/8-1/4 cup
Add peanut butter and combine thoroughly
Cover lid and cook for around 5-10 minutes, depending on how crispy you want the cabbage
Add 2-3 eggs to the pot. Cover until the eggs are cooked.
Serve with rice or meat, optionally garnish with a little tabasco and/or finely chopped herbs.

name: Sweet Potato Applesauce Latke
steps: Grate sweet potatos
Squeeze most of the liquid from the potatos
Add apple sauce, a little honey and spices
Form into patties, it's a little difficult but not impossible to get these to stay together without egg
Fry in bacon fat
Serve with a side of bacon

name: Tuna fried rice
steps: Prepare a pilav style rice. This should be dry with little fat or excess moisture.
Saute the onion in 1 tbsp olive oil
Add the cabbage and bean sprouts
Stir in red pepper paste and paprika.
Add the cooked rice
Add the miso and honey mixture and combine thoroughly
Add Tabasco if desired
Mix in the tuna
Move the rice to one side of the skillet and crack two eggs
When they are ready mix the scrambled eggs in with the rice
Garnish with katsuobushi and scallions before serving

name: Spicy miso udon

ingredients.name: chopped green pepper or jalapeno pepper

steps: Make the dashi-style broth with chicken broth and katsuobushi. Set aside. (Note:I used chicken broth because kelp may not be available in the United States, but true dashi is made with kelp.)
Cook the udon noodles, douse with cold water and set aside.
In a medium sized soup pot, stir fry sucuk, green pepper and onion in olive oil
Add cabbage
Add red pepper powder and red pepper paste. Stir to combine.
Add dashi.
Simmer on low to mid heat, do not let this get too hot because the flavor of the katsuobushi is very delicate.
Add bean sprouts. Continue to simmer until vegetables reach desired texture.
Add cooked noodles.
Add miso, honey and tabasco. Do not let the soup reach a boil, too much heat will destroy the soups rich flavor.
Add enoki and sardines just enough to warm through.
Crack an egg or two into the broth and serve when the the yoke is just firm
Garnish with scallions

name: Apricot chicken salad
steps: Combine shredded chicken, apricots, apple and celery.
Add yogurt, honey and hot paprika powder or other desired seasoning
Mix well

name: Peanut butter banana oatmeal
steps: Cook the oats in water. If using regular oats this should take around 10 minutes, instant oats will cook more quickly.
Put the cooked oats in a bowl
Add milk, peanut butter, honey and sliced banana
Mash until the banana and ingredients are all thoroughly combined.
Top with honey and serve warm.

name: Sriracha oatmeal
steps: Cook the lentils in water until they are very soft.
If there is any remaining water, strain the lentils.
Mash the lentils.
In a saucepan, heat the chicken broth.
Return lentils to the heat and add heated chicken broth and oats.
When oats are cooked, add Sriracha. The amount of Sriracha depends entirely on your preference.
Add around 1/2 tbsp honey and enough salt to season

name: Ice Cream

ingredients.name: a few drops of vanilla essence

steps: Pour milk into a pot with vanilla and bring almost to a boil.
Beat the egg yolks and sugar.
Pour some of the milk into the egg mixture, whisking constantly.
Pour egg and milk mix back into the pot, still whisking. Heat gently until thickened.
Pour into a bowl and place in sink half-filled with cold water to cool.
Stir occasionally, then chill in the fridge.
Whip the cream and fold into the mix.
Pour into an ice cream tub.
Prepare as per your ice cream machine's instructions.
Alternately, freeze in tub for 3 hours. Every hour, whisk the ice cream to stop ice crystals from forming.
